# Aim
- To plot the parks and forest reserves along with the map of Ghana

## Load libraries
```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
library(rgeos)
library(sp)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
```

## Get Data
```{r}
bbox_buffer <- readRDS("data/bbox_buffer_transition_ghana.rds") %>% st_as_sf() 
ghana_map_1 <- readOGR("data/gadm41_GHA_shp/gadm41_GHA_1.shp", verbose = FALSE) %>% st_as_sf()
ghana_map_2 <- readOGR("data/gadm41_GHA_shp/gadm41_GHA_2.shp", verbose = FALSE) %>% st_as_sf()
ghana_parks <- readOGR("data/forests_parks/Forest_and_Game_Reserves.shp", verbose = FALSE) %>% st_as_sf()
bbox_buffer <- bbox_buffer %>% st_transform(crs = crs(ghana_parks))
```

## Visualise data
```{r}
plot(st_geometry(bbox_buffer))
plot(st_geometry(ghana_parks), add = TRUE)
```

- extract only Bui national park
```{r}
forest_reserves <- ghana_parks %>% dplyr::filter(Type == "Forest_reserves")
bui_np <- ghana_parks %>% dplyr::filter(ID == "Bui NP")

plot(st_geometry(bbox_buffer))
# plot(st_geometry(forest_reserves), add = TRUE)
plot(st_geometry(bui_np), add = TRUE)
```

```{r}
tmap_mode("view")

tm_shape(forest_reserves) +
  tm_polygons()
```
